short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Message with others through your favorite browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing LetsHang!: Your Passport to Fun and Connection! Transform your browsing experience into a lively social hub with this Google extension. Chat, share, and laugh with friends old and new, right from your browser. Say goodbye to dull solo browsing and hello to endless possibilities for connection. Let's Hang is not just an extension, it's your digital hangout spot!

Coming Soon 
- Real time notifications
- Group chats
- Search for a chat

Email me if any errors are found!
